analysis.description:
OxChainNetwork.startDate (/unique_contracts/0x7589e58b2197ca56bcd186c871d3c9abde35b737.sol#135) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_contracts/0x7589e58b2197ca56bcd186c871d3c9abde35b737.sol#243-256)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x7589e58b2197ca56bcd186c871d3c9abde35b737.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x7589e58b2197ca56bcd186c871d3c9abde35b737.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x7589e58b2197ca56bcd186c871d3c9abde35b737.sol#112-113) is not in mixedCase
